sub_title: Technical Manager / Program Manager / Project Manager, Electronics background. 16+ years of experience.
summary:
Electronics engineer at heart with 16+ years of experience in the field of electronics design and product development. 

I help companies dvelop fitting electronics for thier new products.  

My core competence is developing innovative electronic solutions for new markets.

Further I can execute complex global projects from the design stage to production. Think of multi-million pcs per year level volumes. Design for manufacturing is also one of my key competences. Working with multidisciplinary teams in various international locations is natural for me.

I have delivered multiple complex but mass market electronics designs.

authors.headline: Technical Manager / Program Manager / Project Manager, Electronics background. 16+ years of experience.
Photonics Executive & Advisor | Speaker | Author | Inventor | Investor | Expert Witness

profile_positions.description:
As Project leader I manage a group of highly professional engineers (often with academic backgrounds) and many years of experience in the industry.

 Create and maintain project plans and proactively drive project realization over multiple sub-projects. 

 Manage the delivery of specifications, designs, prototypes and test plans in my team that meet the requirements of the ASML development program. 

Review technical proposals, manage time, quality and budget as well as the risks and issues in my projects.

Work with team-leaders and sub-project leaders from mechanical, electronic and software development who take operational responsibility within my project. 

Work intensively with external co-developers and external manufacturing facilities to ensure timely delivery of prototypes and a smooth transition to volume production. 

 Interaction with other project leaders on technical content and with group leaders on allocation of people to my project.
profile_positions.title: Manager Technical- Power & High Voltage

profile_positions.description:
Managing the day-to-day operational performance ensuring both internal and client facing operations are delivered to a high standard.

Decision-making on policy, planning, budgets, and strategy to build the electronics program.

Building and maintaining alliances and partnerships.

Ensuring team ideas lead to successful product development initiatives.

Determining the resources and team headcount required to deliver an effective project roll-out.

Delivering program financial results in accordance with agreed KPIs and targets.

Actively managing risk and opportunities to mitigate risk exposure and realise opportunities.

Executing and ensuring optimal communication of issues and decisions made.

Reporting of the program's status to the stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Program Director- Electronics

profile_positions.description:
-Electronics Design for LED Lighting Application(1W-300W)
-IP generating research on lighting electronics
-Electronics architecture design and implementation till product launch
-Solid theoretical and experimental experience in the discipline
- Experience in managing a group of technical professionals
-Ability to work in an international multicultural setting
-Highly motivated team player with excellent social, coordination and communication skills
-Team superviser
-Lab management
profile_positions.title: Senior Electronics Engineer

profile_positions.description:
1. Advisor on Design of LED Drivers used in white label lighting products for big label brands in the US.
2. Advisior on Design of electronics for new generation furniture having integrated electronics for wireless charging and lighting.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Design Engineer-Electronics

profile_positions.description:
NTL buys Lemnis lighting and forms NTL- lemnis. My Role remains same.

a) Manage complete LED driver design portfolio for all applications as per business plan.
b) Guide a team of electronic engineers in design principles and concepts.
c) LED product development
d) Value engineering projects / TCO (total cost optimisation projects)
e) Design for high volume manufacturing.
profile_positions.title: Design Manager-Electronics

profile_positions.description:
a) Manage complete LED driver design portfolio for all applications as per business plan.
b) Guide a team of electronic engineers in design principles and concepts.
c) LED product development
d) Value engineering projects / TCO (total cost optimisation projects)
e) Extensive CFL and TL lamp ballast design knowledge(CFL, T5, T8, 1x and 2x ballasts)
f) Electronic component construction level knowledge and application understanding.
g) Design principles for electronics design as per stringent grid conditions.
profile_positions.title: Design Manager-Electronics

profile_positions.description:
Design manager / project manager of electronics developments for electronic ballasts (CFLi, Standalone ballasts for T3 till T8 fluorescent lamps)to meet the business line rquirements per year. Responsible for the progress of projects and management of risks. 

High volume production designs(>2,5Mpcs per year for all designs combined)

Coordinating with production to review on-line performance of products.

Using various quality tools like fishbone, DFMEA and ISO to develop and analyse products and power supplies. Following ISO 9001:2008 quality standard for R&D internal processes. Making the process better by editing various steps and process of gathering inputs from customer and markets.

Market failure analysis and production failure analysis.

Design improvements based on market and production failure.

Team leader for group of engineers who need to be trained with technologies and reviewing how to integrate them with various projects based on skill set.

Various projects on value engineering to meet cost targets.

Coordinate with the QA and production people to acquaint them with both On-line and off-line product testing requirements.

Regularly Liaising with NPL, BIS, ERDA, ERTL laboratories to arrange type testing of products(Third parties in India)
profile_positions.title: Manager - Design and development

profile_positions.description: 50% time responsible for various designs of electronic ballasts for fluorescent lamps (T3 till T8). This includes CFLi and standalone electronic ballasts. Design for high volume production (total more than 1Mpcs per year). 50% time reviewing work of engineers and technicians. Making BOM and doing various cost reduction projects.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager - Design

profile_positions.description: Design of electronic ballasts for fluorescent lamp applications starting from 5W to 72W. Tube diameters T3 till T8.
profile_positions.title: Research And Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Testing components for performance and quality conformance against prescribed specifications.

Component engineering to meet stringent performance and cost requirements. 

Value engineering of designs to meet market competition.

Resolving customer complaints resulting in design improvements to their total satisfaction with minimum turnaround time.

Constantly supporting the marketing function to understand and come out with products having specific applications and requirements.

Coordinating with reputed instrument suppliers to constantly evolve the lab with new and reliable test equipments like CROs, Power meters etc
profile_positions.title: Engineering Trainee
